Name: Troll Area
Author: Bavario
Description:
Meant as a silly joke. Entering this area will perform one of the following actions:

- Obj_arg0 = -1: Crashes the game.
- Obj_arg0 = 0: Shuts down the console.
- Obj_arg0 = 1: Exits to the Home Menu.
- Obj_arg0 = 2: Very strongly rumbles the Wiimote.
- Obj_arg0 = 3: Play a random sound effect every frame
